#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
 int t,n,total,ans,excl;
 scanf("%d",&t);
 while(t--)
 {
  scanf("%d",&n);
  if(n<=2)
  {
   total = 4*n;
   ans = total*(total-1)*(total-2);
   ans/=6;
   printf("%d\n",ans);
  }
  else
  {
   total = 4*n;
   ans = total*(total-1)*(total-2);
   ans/=6;
   excl = n*(n-1)*(n-2);
   excl/=6;
   ans-=(4*excl);
   printf("%d\n",ans);
  }
 }
 return 0;
}
